name: ZeroChat
author: ZeroIRC

sections.description: ZeroChat makes it possible for you to easily add a ZeroIRC channel (chat room) onto your WordPress installation. ZeroChat can be added to a page simply through the options page on the Dashboard or there is also a shortcode included for use in posts and other pages. ZeroChat also includes a widget in order to place the number of current users in your chartroom on your sidebar.
sections.installation:
1. Upload all files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Change the settings in WP Dashboard -> Settings -> ZeroChat
sections.faq:
Where is the full documentation?

Documentation is available at www.zeroirc.com/zerochat-wp
sections.changelog:
1.2.2

  • Add’s functionality to automatically use the WordPress username if the user is logged in.

1.2.1

  • Bugfix – Fixes DNS locations
  • Fixes minor error in Statistics
  • Fixes minor connection error

1.2

  • Bugfix – Fixes connection problems

1.1

  • Added an option for AJAX Chat
  • Added AJAX Shortcode
  • Added Flash Shortcode
  • Changed Shortcode to support both flash and AJAX
  • Added AutoConnect option for Flash Chat

1.0

  • First Public Release

short_description: This plugin makes it possible to add a ZeroIRC Chatroom onto your Wordpress installation.
description: ZeroChat makes it possible for you to easily add a ZeroIRC channel (chat room) onto your WordPress installation. ZeroChat can be added to a page simply through the options page on the Dashboard or there is also a shortcode included for use in posts and other pages. ZeroChat also includes a widget in order to place the number of current users in your chartroom on your sidebar.

upgrade_notice.1.2.2: Add's functionality to automatically use the Wordpress username if the user is logged in.
upgrade_notice.1.2.1: Bugfixes fix issues in connecting and issues in retrieving statistical data. Upgrade ASAP.
upgrade_notice.1.2: Bugfix fixes serious connections problems in Flash chat. Upgrade immediately.
upgrade_notice.1.1: Added multiple extra features including AJAX Chat and made changes to the shortcodes.
